# Ad Copywriting

## Quick Start

This skill helps you write high-converting ad copy. For complete frameworks, see the [Complete Guide](references/guide.md).

## Execution Checklist

### Writing Ad Copy

- [ ] Define target audience (specific persona)
- [ ] Identify pain point or desire
- [ ] Choose framework (PAS, AIDA, BAB)
- [ ] Write hook headline (stops scroll)
- [ ] State benefit clearly
- [ ] Include social proof (if possible)
- [ ] Create clear CTA
- [ ] Test multiple variations
- [ ] Track CTR and conversion

## Key Frameworks

- **PAS**: Problem → Agitate → Solution
- **AIDA**: Attention → Interest → Desire → Action
- **BAB**: Before → After → Bridge

## Platform Specs

- **Facebook/Instagram**: 125 chars headline, 125 body
- **LinkedIn**: 150 chars headline, 300 body
- **Google Search**: 30 chars headline (3x), 90 chars description (2x)
- **Twitter**: 280 chars total

## Quick Wins

- Lead with benefit, not feature
- Use numbers ("3x faster", "Save $500")
- Test emotional vs. rational hooks
- A/B test headlines always
